tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE grants (
  grant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
  grant_title TEXT NOT NULL, 
  grant_description TEXT, 
  organization TEXT NOT NULL, 
  grant_amount DECIMAL, 
  grant_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE grant_proposals (
  proposal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  organization_name VARCHAR(255),
  proposal_description TEXT,
  submission_date DATE,
  approval_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE funding_history (
  funding_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  proposal_id INT,
  funding_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  funding_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_proposal FOREIGN KEY (proposal_id) REFERENCES grant_proposals(proposal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE grant_proposals (
    proposal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    proposal_name TEXT,
    proposal_description TEXT,
    submission_date TIMESTAMP,
    organization_name TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE funding_history (
    grant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    proposal_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    funding_date TIMESTAMP,
    donor_name TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (proposal_id) REFERENCES grant_proposals(proposal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE grant_proposals (
	proposal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	proposal_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	proposal_description TEXT,
	submission_date TIMESTAMP,
	status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE funding_history (
	history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	proposal_id INT,
	source_id INT,
	amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
	grant_date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (proposal_id) REFERENCES grant_proposals(proposal_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES funding_sources(source_id)
);

CREATE TABLE proposal_reviews (
	review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	proposal_id INT,
	reviewer_name VARCHAR(100),
	review_date DATE,
	score INT,
	feedback TEXT,
	FOREIGN KEY (proposal_id) REFERENCES grant_proposals(proposal_id)
);
